name: Fadeholm
description: Endless exploration and adventure awaits those fearless enough to enter. Survival is only the beginning! Fadeholm is a procedural generated virtual reality (VR) survival dungeon crawler designed in the same vein as old school Nethack and Rogue.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel I5-4590, AMD FX8350 or better Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
